comments.text: we get straight ift to OMSk.
recently waiting time was 1sec
also take local train from main station to "Aeroflot" station. position is couple hundreds meters to the north
Dir. Novosib
Get here with minibus #1122 from the central train station. Get out at stop Puteprovod, good for hitching towards Omsk, Tyomen
This positions is very good, Traffic is too much. We caught car during 3 min in direction to Pechory.

Excellent position for hitchhiking!
Immediately after the traffic light, a lot of traffic at low speed. You can catch the car in the direction of Estonia.

Нас сразу подобрала фура, до Уфы. 
Нас 2 человека и 2 рюкзака по 70л.
very good spot. lifts to Tyumen or Kurgan available

Its a good spot where cars can stop easily. we had 2 cars who stopped, one after 3 min and one after 15, we came fraom the reai station and we were in 2 places.
there is a litle parcplace where across the road are 2 houses that was the better sport
There were road works when I got there, so cars had to slow down. The first two that stopped were going towards Samara, the third took us in the direction of Moscow.

Get to Zaymishe (Займище) station by train and walk up a staircase leading onto the viaduct. Be aware you'll be hitchhiking on a motorway. There's a gas station a few hundred metres to the north, this might be a much better stop.

М5 на Рязань, Пензу.
Позиция сразу за забором.
Сюда удобно приезжать Голутвинской электричкой до ст. Хорошево или 113 км.
Здесь уже почти не встречаются подмосковные машины, и велика вероятность встретить прямую до Рязани и дальше.
You can also walk to the end of the city or take the bus #480 (it doesn't go as far but it's cheaper) and start hitchhiking.
Waited here with 4 persons and got ride to baikalsk in 10-15 mins
take a bus to shelehov from irkutsk. get off from a bus where it leaves the main road and turns to a town.walk a bit. really good place to hh towards ulan ude
Direction: Perm via Kungur or Barda, Yekaterinburg
Лучшая позиция на Уфу,в метрах 500 впереди находится радар на асфальте,находится полиция в трубе)))
Good spot for hiking to Chernushka. Here is bus stop and enough place
на заправке надо лишь посмотрев на номера поспрашивать у водителей возьмут ли они вас
на заправке просто надо высмотреть подходящую машину по номерам или подходить ко всем водителям. укхал подойдя ко 2му водиле

Nice place near to road police post(ДПС) to start hitchhiking to the south, in the direction of Arzamas, Saransk, Penza, Saratov. Arrive at bus station near here by bus number №2 and walk for 5 miniutes to the spot.

Неплохое место рядом с постом ДПС для начала движения в сторону юга: Арзамас, Саранск, Пенза, Саратов. Едете до автостанции на автобусе №2 и идёте до позиции около 5 минут.

Nice place to hitchhike from Moscow to St. Petersburg: mostly long distance cars, 500m from train station "Путепроводная", waiting time less than 15 minutes

Неплохое место для стопа в сторону Петербурга: много дальних машин, 500м от пл. Путепроводная, всегда уезжал менее чем за 15 минут
A very good spot. Plenty of space for a car to stop. The speed is low. The way to the spot is described on the page "Kaliningrad".

So at winter I drank some vodka and rode my bear to Chukotka. I stood there for some time until I saw a dog team. So I thumbed up and got picked. The driver dropped me at Alyaska. Ditch Mexico, there's a hole up north!
The best place for hitching out of Ussuriisk. Just walk past the old traffice police building and there you will see a straight road with a wide shoulder. Took me 3 min to be picked up
Как только пойдет расширение отбойника, начинайте стопить. Место идел, проверенно не однакратно

Good position!
Cars go slowly after the traffic lights.
Cars traveling in the Great Luke.
Cars driving slowly after the traffic lights. The waiting time is minimal.
Many cars were stopping but most going only to Novoaltaysk. We made a mistake by taking one of them and got stranded there.
There's a bus stop here, the traffic is not too fast and many cars will stop. Walkable distance from the city centre.
A lot of cars stopping were going just nearby while many cars pass the city by the ringroads, but after about 15 minutes we got a ride 100kms towards Kazan.
Got here by bus (don't remember the number) from the city centre. Great spot, a lot of slow traffic, gas station, room to pull over.
The hitchhike spot as described on the wiki page. You can reach it with busses 5, 9, 9a and 101.
Good place with bus stop
Самое лучшее место по трассе от Ставрополя

From here I hitched a ride to Bologoye to visit Alexey (CS) and have a stopover while hitchhiking from St Petersburg to Moscow. 
I didn't have to wait for more than 10 minutes.
from Moscow to Piter
nice place for stop to Piter from Moscow
Лучшее место для стопа в Питер

The best point for hiking to Saint-Petersburg from Moscow, IMHO, take free bus from Rechnoy vokzal metro station to "Kapitoliy" shopping mall, go under the Moscow ring road, it's from the right side of "Kapitoliy" and you'll on the bus stop Butakovo (Бутаково on Russian). Or another way: take suburban train (16,5 roubles) from Petrovsko-Razumovskaya station in Moscow to Khimki and just go to the left side from the station. Try to hike, but only with sigh with place where you would like to go.

Excellent place for going to Georgia! Waited here for a ridiculous 2min until a car took me directly to the border, from where the first car took me straight to Tbilisi. Cars are really slow here and I assess the overall hitchability as insanely great! There is public transport from Vladikavkaz but I forgot which minibuses go there. Ask people or add it here.
От границы сюда едет автобус №1. Поток на Каменск-Шахтинский и на трассу М4.
There is a military checkpoint. But soldier are polite. Local people are very good, HH is excellent!
The best place for HH in my life! Local people stops even if you dont ask! Some people also fed us and we could not refuse =)
Very good spot to get ride to St Petersburg.
From subway station "Shosse Entusiasov" walk 5-10 min.
This spot is cheaper to get comparing to 37,5 RURs for 118 bus to the next spot. Buses and even tram 7 stops not far from here. Cars are slow after roundaout.
Nice point, wide space to stop for cars
To go to Mongolia, take the minibus 28 to "Istok" and you will be dropped off at the airport road junction. You can start there or walk for a bit, it's fairly easy.
dir: kirillov, vytegra. local bus from the centre takes you here. petrol station on the opposite side.
на Вытегру
на СПб
Р-21 на Петербург. Из Петрозаводска автобус до Вилги, третья остановка в Вилге.

Great place to depart from Gelendjik to the directions of Krasnodar and Sochi!

Road traffic here is mostly filtered from the local one. Staying right after the "Lukoil" oil station you have good chances to get a ride within several minutes.

In order to get there: take a bus from Centralny Rynok of Gelendjik in the arbitrary out-city direction (except for Divnomorsk and Kabardinka). Then ask a driver to drop you near the turn to Aderbievka ("povorot na Aderbievku") and walk forward 150m.
there is a petrol station and a bar there, with plenty of space for the cars to stop.
there is a bus stop. we stayed close to it just 10 minutes.
aparently not very good but we were taken in less than 5 minutes.
It' s a roads cross, with a lot of space for cars or trucks to stop. And as there is nothing there, the cars going in to your direction can see you easily.
Good place to hitchhike, but in summer are a lot of small flyes that are anoying even if is just 10 minutes.
Close to a petrol station, there were plenty of them, also a supermarket.
we were a couple with signal to Khabarovsk. In one bus stop.
We were a couple with signal to Spassk Dalnyi
Just in the middle of nowhere.
to Moscow
to Pudozh
to Vologda
Direction: Chaykovskiy
to Moscow
to Spb
Directions: Arkhangelsk, Ivanovo, Saint-Petersburg via Yaroslavl'
Spot for a hiking from Vladimir to the East

My usual spot for a hiking from Moscow to the east. Take suburban train to "14 km" station (direction Elektrogorsk) from Novogireevo or Kurskiy vokzal train stations in Moscow. When you're in "14 km", just back to the highway M-7
Direction: Ufa, Orenburg
Direction: Perm, Syktyvkar
Direction: Ufa, Perm via Barda
Here're cross of the roads: to the right to Yekaterinburg, Perm via Kungur, and straight to Perm via Barda. It's if you're going from South
П. Листвянка. За остановкой на новой дороге в сторону Рязани, Москвы. М5
Выезд из Рязани, Куйбышевское шоссе, М5. В сторону Пензы, Самары, Челябинска
Михайловское шоссе, Р132. Выезд из Рязани в сторону Михайлова, Новомосковска, Тулы.
to south
to: M18
to: Monchegorsk-Olenegorsk-Murmansk
In the direction of Moscow.
From here you can go towards of Chelyabinsk. Very nice place. Can be reached on 221 bus.
Great roundabout with army, cars have to stop.
Автобус № 48 из Нижнего. В Москву автостопом удобно в любое время. Я езжу ночью, а утром в Москве.
nice lit position for getting direct lift to Samara. police checkpoint with speed limit 40
diretc lifts to Tyumen available here
I had direct car to Omsk from here
space right after police check point is good for h-hiking due to speed limit
cars are slow because of roundabout. great spot to get a car to Achinsk.
Ring road of Vladimir. Trucks have to go here in eastern direction
St. Petersburg
there's metro Annina close by, which makes this one of the best spots near MKAD.
In the direction of Kharkiv, Crimea, Black Sea. Cars are slowing down here, traffic is huge, and it's easy to get a ride in 5 minutes.
near metro "Ploshad Marksa" (K.Marks square) from busstop "Magazin Kristall" take bus 103, 1003, 1303 to "Razvilka" busstop. Walk a bit and then h-hike right after crossroads

Vorov: near the railroad crossing is THE best spot on the SPb-Moscow route. Even Recommended to get out here and try to get a ride straight to Moscow esp if your ride is taking you to Vyshnyj Volochek - it's a 15km long town ahead!
There is gas station and crossing there, a very convenient spot. You need to walk 300m from Moskovskaya Slavyanka (Московская славянка) which is described in Wiki on St. Petersburg.
Petrol station Rosneft. Very easy to get a lift to both direction (Finnland and St. Petersburg).
There are a lot of trucks on the opposite side from petrol station Rosneft. Very easy to take a lift to Finnland.
Here is a cafe called \\'Roza vetrov\\'. Hitch from here, but only to east direction of Russia (Novosibirsk).
Perfect spot to hitch out of town direction M18. From train station, trolleybus #1 or #8, get out at the first roundabout (you see a big supermarket on the other side of the street)
Take train from Belorusskaya to Kubinka. Exellent position behind traffic police station and wide roadside.
Hitchhiking Spot for the M18 direction Olonets, St. Petersburg
Very good spot towards Kazan, all traffic slow behind the DPS station.

Tre bona, sed se vi volas iri al Mongolio kaj estas te malvarma, plibonigus peti plej longa veturadon ol nure gxis la venonta vilajxo cxar la vetero cxi tie en malvarma epoko estas mortiga. Vi povas trovi minibuson gxis tia loko ekde UlanUde.
Kiam mi alvenis kaj komencis peti mi estis doninta veturadon.

Культура этой остановки такова, что вечером из краснодара едут по домам вахтовики которые часто останавливаются сами, дабы подбросить местных в сторону смоленской за символический донат или за спасибо
simple perfekta punkto
Ĉi tiu punkto estas magia. Kaj la maniero kiel mi alvenis ĉi tien eĉ pli, Uber veturigis min ĉi tien ĉar li elektos iun ĉi tie.

Tuj kiam mi estis lasita ĉe la transversa sekcio, mi komencis marŝi al la policejo 4 km antaŭe kaj aprobis la dikfingron supren, sed tuj kiam mi transiris la ponton, simpatia kamionisto haltigis min iranta al Kemerovo. Eĉ en la mallumo de la malfrua nokto eblas. Do simple faru ĝin.

Mi haltis ĉe ĉi tiu punkto ĉirkaŭ la dua matene laŭ loka tempo. Mi provis petveturi dum unu horo, sed ne estis multe da movado kaj ili estis tre rapidaj. Mi estis tro laca kaj tio estis tro malvarma. Mi reiris al la bushaltejo kaj starigis mian tendon. Mi dormis kiom mi bezonis, sed preskaŭ perdis la ŝancon. Dum la nokto kelkaj kamionoj haltis kaj foriris matene. Mi kaptis unu el la lastaj. Ĝi iris rekte al Vladivostok. Aŭtotransportaj kamionoj iras tre malproksimen, ĉar ili transportas importit
Точка сразу после пункта оплаты. Все едут медленно, есть место для остановки
Отличное место, есть где остановиться фурам и машинам.

Walked around a bit and this seems to be the best spot in Shebalino. The gas stations were not very frequented.

General advice for all of Chuysky trakt: Best is to thumb at bus stops, every village has one. Even inside of town, cars have very high speeds, but visibility is often very good. Takes some time to find cars (average 30min), but you will always find rides. Many locals and other travelers also do hitchhiking, you may not be the only one at a spot.

Great spot with a red light, cars are slow and see you for the time of waiting. Better accept a ride to Karakol and continue from there, most people don't go further up.

General advice for all of Chuysky trakt: Best is to thumb at bus stops, every village has one. Even inside of town, cars have very high speeds, but visibility is often very good. Takes some time to find cars (average 30min), but you will always find rides. Many locals and other travelers also do hitchhiking, you may not be th

About crossing the Mongolian border: There is a long line of waiting cars. I went up to them and asked if I could join them. Got rejected by two kazakh cars. They often travel with the whole family to visit relatives in Mongolia, so they may have no space to take you. Better ask cars with russian plates. I found two belarussian travelers who would take me. Even as a westerner without speaking much russian it should be doable to find a lift, if you're lucky you may find travelers from western cou
Несколько раз тут стопил в 2023. Удобное место, местные быстро подбирали и везде на Запад до Мурома
Хорошая точка, трижды уезжал с нее в сторону Москвы, в том числе дважды ночью. Спускался с Шушарской дороги,  чтобы попасть на М11. Каждый раз ждал около 5-20 минут.
Armenian car picked us up, he expected money at first, but after being good company we got a free ride to Stepantsminda )))
Хорошее место, мы долго ждали, т. к. нас было двое + два рюкзака и собака. Тем не менее повезло поймать фуру до Красноярска. Стоять нужно именно после светофора
Heavy traffic. Nizhnevartovsk has a large population, so Megion's car can pass through.

Stopover point to the east of Novosibirsk. You can get there by train (eastbound, to Moshkovo or Bolotnoye). Local website for suburban trains "express prigorod", a ticket from the central station costs 126 rubles, $ 1.3. From Gagarinskaya 110 rubles, metro and suburban train stop. Then walk from the station in Moshkovo to the highway 2.5 km. The point is located right at the exit from the Gazprom gas station. There is also a traffic light on the highway in front of the gas station, so every 2 m
Позиция на остановке
Позиция на выезде из Ленинска
После поворота на Заплавное

Nice place for start trip from Moscow to Kazan.
We arrived by train Moscow-Petushki.
Пост ГАИ. Ребята останавливают автобусы для проверки документов, они помогут. Не забудьте надеть светоотражающий жилет ночью!
нас 2 человека, 2 рюкзака по 70л, нас взял дальнобойщик
Нас 2 человека и 2 рюкзака по 70л.
Was standing at the gas station.  People that are delivering cars to the west tend to take you since they are driving long distances.

I spent the night here in a tent near the ДПС post.  They gave me sausages, bread and warm water to cook.  The next day I got a ride straight to Chita at 5 o clock in the morning.  It was the longest continuous ride I have ever gotten.  1600 km.
недалеко от светофора машины сбавляют скорость и у водителей есть много времени чтобы решиться вас взять на борт
добрый парень калмык отвез до одинокого тополя и вернул на трассу
Direction: Stavropol'

We crossed from Georgia to Russia on a Monday morning in July 2024, then back on a Sunday afternoon. Some things for hitchhikers to note:
-It can be cold and rainy even in summer, be prepared.
-Line of cars were backed up on both sides all the way to the borders. It's very far from one border to another, but the traffic was so bad that it was faster to walk. For the love of all that's holy, if the traffic is backed up all the way to customs, WALK!!!! You are SO lucky, you're the only person wh

You shouldn't have any problem of finding a lift across the border (crossing for pedestrians prohibited), Russian/Ossetian couple took me to Tbilisi. Be prepared for Caucasian hospitality and curiosity! :)
Stood here for 10 min, got a ride to Klin.
Moscow-SPB, early SEP, two backpackers. start 9AM arrived 4AM next morning (5H Jam on entering SPB). 3 hitches. Rainy.
For Moscow->Spb, June, single male, started 1pm, arrived to Spb at 2am, 4 hitches. Better to start earlier
For Moscow _spb, June, two people, started 2pm, arrived 5 hitches from here to Spb at 2 am. Not bad in general.

From Moscow to St.Petersburg.
Take bus 851 from Rechoy Vokzal metro station, leave it on Cherkizovo stop. The spot is behind the ramp, 5 min wa from the bus stop.
It has never taken me more that 15 min to lift.
It' s very good place to hitchhike in Chita direction. Because the most of the people who pass over it goes straight to Chita, so we get direct lift to that city in just 30 minutes.
take lift only to Pospelikha crossroads where car flow multiples from other cities or directly to Barnaul
bus 4 is very good for getting to Myasocombinat bussstop. works only at morning and evening time

use trolleybus #1,2 to get to Telecenter with highttower then cross railroads and turn right and then h-hike or walk follow widest paved road throughout industrial zone to bypass road. almost all cars here are transit.

siberian_explorer

A good place but not the best as many people wrote. Me and my friend (two guys) were waiting for the car about for one hour, despite the much traffic and enough space to stop, only one driver stopped and drove us to Ржев. Hope it was just not our day ;)
На электричке от Рижского вокзала до станции Шаховская, далее до трассы пешком
Hiched here for several hours, then got ride ~10 km down the road. After that got ride to Cheliabinsk in 20min.
Hitchhiking spot just behind a DPS police post. Best chances are if you hitch a ride some 200-300m behind the police officers

I hitchhiked a bit further at the border itself. It was Tuesday noon in August 2016. There was no queue there at all, in fact, the border was quite desolate. Nobody ever demanded any kind of permission from me nor did anyone try to get money out of me. Though I must admit this permission-for-border-areas thing does exist (in Russia and Belarus for sure) but unless you encounter police, nobody will check it. Just hitchhike to Mamonovo - it's not that difficult :).

You can get to Mamonovo by bus from Kaliningrad. But be careful!!! It is some kind of a restricted border zone so you need some official permit for entering it (you would be informed by military men who stop you in the street. And they don't care that it is the first time you here about this rubbish). Still they allow hitchhiking just before the border crossing. A lot of Poles going across the border. But it can take some hours to cross. And be carefull!!! Russians can demand money at the border

Направление из города Брянска на Белорусь (город Гомель). Автомобиль пойманный здесь скорее всего увезет вас до Выгоничей или до другого локального поселения по трассе. Оттуда уже будет легче уехать в сторону Белоруси. Время ожидание 10-20 минут, зависит от разных условий.

Место для выезда из города Брянска. Съезд с заправки, скорость автомобилей из города не большая. Больше 15 минут здесь ни разу не стоял. С этого места вы или уедите в сторону города Орла или же машина может ехать до первой развязки: на Киев или на Москву, реже на Гомель
This positions is very good, There is traffic isn't very good. We caught car during 10 min in direction to Pskov, and driver went to St.Petersburg.

Take a bus (24, 28,34, 45, 103, 104, 105, 107, 108, 112 and some others) going to Sedanka (Седанка), get off and walk forward along the road. Go under the bridge and there will be the stairs on the right. Go up and you're on the major highway going north! Walk north some 50 meters, there will be a spot with a shoulder to pull over
Direction Minsk.
Good spot to kaliningrad direction
Small road, not many cars, it is easy to hitch to kaliningrad direction
good spot to go to Yekaterinburg
A little car go in the direction of Pskov.
Хорошо едут в сторону города Дно.
Good, but small distance.

Good place for hitchhiking!
I went for 15 minutes.
Вот на этой позиции я так или иначе оказываюсь каждый раз когда стоплю в сторону Карасука. Ничего страшного. Главное, доехать до кольца-развилки.
weight control, a lot of trucks to peterburg stops here
the best point to go to Saint-Petersburg, this place is a post of traffic police and it is full of lights
Just after the bus stop there is a lot of space to pull over. Get here from the metro station by trolleybusses 20, 37 (cheaper than marshrutka) and probably more.
Good hitchhiking spot towards the Finnish border either Vaalimaa or Imatra. The Lukoil gas station is next by. Might work if asking drivers there.

I was hitchhiking from the bridge. One car stopped on the other side of the road and took me to Vyborg. The driver said the place was not a good one since there is almost no place for cars to stop by. So I would advise you trying hitchhiking from the nearby bus stop. However, the bus traffic is rather dense here.

Stand right in front of the bus stop Poselok Malye Klyki to hitchhike eastwards to the M7 direction Ufa.
On google maps It seems like the stop is 100 meter further west which is wrong as far as I can tell.
Only when fest "Kubana"

From railway station take a bus #43 or shuttle bus (marshrutka) #3 till the stop "Ploshad Marshala Zhukova". Walk down to Larina street and the spot is next to the pedestrian bridge over the highway.
Although it's still in the city, but the place is good.
Good place if you are moving to Rostov-na-Donu. 15 min of waiting
Nice place to move the west. About 15 minutes of waiting
This is detour of Pyatigorsk and a good point to HH to Vladikaukaz
Good point to start stoping to the south
Great!
Good spot. You can meet other hitchhakers there.
There a rural parking lot with a cheap and good Armenian road-restaurant.
Most vehicles going to Russian North West from Europe pass here. A good chance to catch a cargo.
Good spot with undoubtedly good traffic. 2 females, winter, got a lift in 7min
Another start point from Moscow to Saint-Petersburg. You need a bus #581 from Rechnoy Vokzal metro station. Ask locals for "Monument"[m-o-n-u-'m-e-n-t] stop
Was lucky that trucker took me on board. Point to go to direction of Fin-Rus boarder. Waited for 15 mins

It is not possible to cross the border on foot, so there will be taxis and minibuses who will try to take you. They will tell you that you cannot hitchhike. Don't give up and ask other people who are crossing the border in their own vehicles. But also make it clear to them that you are not going to pay for the ride. You will need to write the licence plate number of the car on an immigration form when you enter Mongolia.
A place just after the border crossing. There are lights there so you can hitchhike when its dark. A lot of place for cars to stop. Thus you can spend a lot of time waiting.
Too many locals, but good starting point to Estonia. Huge traffic, nice position after traffic lights. Got 3 cars in 5 minutes
на Вытегру, Пудож
на СПб
на Медвежьегорск, Петрозаводск
на Пудож
на Пудож
на Медвежьегорск, Петрозаводск
Как доехать: от ст.м. "Ул. Дыбенко" маршрутка в Кировск, уточнить у водителя возможность высадки перед съездом на Кировск (скорее всего, вас высадят на лепестке).
very good place to go to saint petersburg, i wakted 10min

good place to go to moscow, you can ask directly to the drivers.
the first driver which i asked droped me in moscow
мне повезло!

good place to go to saint petersburg, i get a ride in 20min. and it was allmost night

you can get there from pskov with the bus number 4 or 4a, it will let you on leningradskoe shosse with krestovskoe shosse, then you have to walk by the leningradskoe shosse to the north like 10 or 15 min
Barnaul direction. It is a gas station here. Take a local train from Novosibirsk  to Mramornaya station (1,5hrs from Novosibirsk, 58rub - 2013year).
Place to go to Novosibirsk direction. Just behind gas station.
Good place to hitch to Arshan direction. It is a busstop here.
There is a gas station nearby if you want to wait or ask the drivers. Also the woods between the road and the railway is good for camping at night.
Very good place to hitchhike, the only problem is the fluency of the traffic in this area, that's why we were so much time.
We were going in direction to Chita.
Close to a hotel where the truck drivers sleep, , with space for the cars to stop.
It was 22:00 when we were there, probably during the day could be easier.
It' s a petrol station and a lot of cars take petrol there before going to Belogorsk. Closs to it, there is a bus stop from where you could also hitch hike next to the road.
Скорость приемлемая, после окончания ограждений имеется хорошая обочина.
Имеет смысл стопить прям на лепестке, под указателем. Поскольку поворот, низкая скорость, имеется отрезок без ограждений, где просто выехать на обочину. Правда, ловится поток только из Томска.
После поворота, маленькая скорость, имеется небольшой «карман» для остановки, затем переходящий в поворот на заправку и поэтому незанятый.

If you have reached these picturesque places, keep in mind the new road between Nizhegorodskaya and Mezmay, which goes over the mountain top, not following a defunct railway. Still it is a rough gravel road. Walk is not impossible, but why not try a mindblowing ride? (Russians do it fast, remember?). Local traffic pretty low, still I managed this road.
---
Коль уж вы добрались до этих живописных мест, имейте в виду новую дорогу между Нижегородской и Мезмаем, которая идёт через верхушку хребта, а

Dagestan isn't as dangerous as media tell. But hitchhiking is not tolerated... in good manner. I mean if you find a local contact, he would follow the national tradition to serve the guest as good as possible, probably driving you along the coast, inviting home for dinner etc., for free, of course. More than just a hitchhike/couchsurf experience. You have to appreciate this muslim region is very different from Russia. Anyway, you better avoid attracting excessive police attention, escpecially wi

weird to see that this spot is marked as good :D
I waited for more than 3 hours for a lift...as well as two other hitchhikers a few hundred metres in front of me. Worst point in russia so far. It doesn't make sense to walk on as well, because there won't come a better spot.
Позиция для выезда из Рязани по М5 в сторону Москвы, Коломны, Бронниц.
You can get this place by city bus 60. (40$ cents). Bus stop called "Razvilka".
to Perm
Кострома город "на Золотом кольце", в европейской части  России. Крупный порт на Волге. Административный центр Костромской Области.
to Moscow
to St-Petersburg
to north

Good point for a hiking to northern part of Leningrad oblast, south of Karelia and to central and northern parts of Finland cross Vyartsilya border point. For a coming to this point you can take free bus to "Mega"-shopping mall from "prospect prosveshcheniya" subway station
this plca is easyest way to leave border check point. here is always some cars from Gornyak passes by
This place is good to hichhiking. I did not wait more than 10 minutes and first car stopped in this spot.
Пост ГИБДД, весовой контроль (очень сильно замедляющий замедляющий фуры), позиция ночью освещена, рядом стоянка фур.
Позиция - за постом ДПС.
Средняя скорость машин. Стопится нормально. До перекрестка - торжище с ночным освещением.
Недействующий пост ДПС. Низкая скорость машин.
Не очень высокая скорость машин. Достаточно места для остановки. Стопщика видно издалека. До перекрестка есть заправка, которая может быть актуальна ночью.
Невысокая скорость машин. Недалеко от позиции - множество автосервисов и кафе, заправка с ночным освещением. Ночью как-то уехали оттуда вчетвером.
Хорошая позиция за кольцом в сторону Чесмы.
Скорость машин невысокая, стопится нормально.
Низкая скорость машин, достаточно места для остановки. Пост ДПС закрыт, но иногда дежурит машина с гаишниками.
Скорость машин небольшая. Много локала. Отсюда можно брать машину до Троицка.
Позиция хорошая, за ж/д переездом скорость машин минимальная. Но в выходные дни при плотном потоке машин автостоп может быть затруднителен.
Места на позиции мало, но если оно не занято, то стопится хорошо.
Позиция за постом ДПС. Рядом - конечная остановка общественного транспорта "Поселок АМЗ". Удобно добираться, стопится нормально.
hitching here is more effective instead right after roundabout. trucks from gas station available. p.s. verify position by openstreetmap or closest google images
cars are too fast here be ready to WAIT
this is the only way to leave Tollyatti in Samara direction using public transport to busstop Zhygulyovskoye More
seems like this place more common for transit cars

От Автовокзала следует доехать на автобусе, следующим на «Кормилицыно», до остановки «Спицыно». В районе остановки дорога разветвляется на две части. Та, которая побольше, налево и с развязкой — наша. Пройти по ней следует за развязку и там стопить (впрочем, можно стопить и перед развязкой).
very long distance cars are available after asking. I had to Samara, for example.
spot right after railcrossing generates long traffic jams in both directions (1km or more). ask drivers while they are waiting and walking around
cars are alow on roundabout so it's a good spot to get a lift at least to the next position
cars are slow on roundabout so it's a good spot to get a lift
cars moving to the Tomsk will leave you here. use any locals to leave town
at first time it looks like this is bad spot but in next 5 minutes I got a lift
A transit point between Barnaul and Rubtsovsk. Landmarks are gas station, cafes, and straight side road to Aleysk.
Using lifts closer than Krasnoyarsk is senceless.
here car flow splits. major part goes to Shyra lake, minor keep moving to north
after 10 minutes first car I've stopped picked me up to Kyzyl
Here located remains of destroed Customs check point. It's a place for pit stop for locals before going to Ak-Dovurak throught mountains. Traffic about 1 car in 10-30 minutes.
great spot to start journey to Tyva after coming back from Kemero region to "Razdolnaya" station by local train
here is new police checkpoint located. speed limited by 40. from metro Zaeltcovskaya take bus 1153, 1053 or 353 to "Sadovyi poselok" then move on to police checkpoint
Crossroad of M52 and Cherepanovo-Suzun road got police checkpoint so cars limited by 40 km/h. It's good to get lifts directly to Barnaul or Novosibirsk
wait for direct lifts to Barnaul
nice spot to hitch directly to Novokuznetck
good spot to hitch further to Rubtcovsk, wait lift to the Klyuchi village
nice position to hitch at least to the next roundabount near Kochki
Take a bus to the airport, then pass all the roundabouts and stay there if heading north-bound.

The main road towards Kirkines is more difficult than other places in Russia to hitch on. There is little civilian traffic and you will likely get picked up by military personnel at some point. There are also military checkpoints along the way, if you are a foreigner you will be asked for your documents and registration at these points so have them close to hand. Expect to be taken into their hut for some questions also. Have fun! :-D
Стойте сразу за поворотом. Отличный отправной пункт на Ригу.
To Baltijsk.
В Балтийск. Доехать на автобусе или троллейбусе до поворота на посёлок Космодемьянского и вернуться к трассе на Балтийск.
good spot past the border toward SPb. traffic slows down due to busy intersection of two roads.
not far from the bridge over the railroad also at the beginning of Lenin street, right after Transport police checkpoint
Позиция для выезда из Рязани по М5 в сторону Москвы, Коломны, Бронниц
Позиция для выезда из Рязани по М5 в сторону Москвы, Коломны, Бронниц
Good for direction Lappeenranta.
Good for direction Lappeenranta

Coming from Moscow, the furthest Marshrutka (70 RUB) will take you here (1h ride) before it goes off the road eastwards towards Voronovo and back. Get out here and hitch some 20m further. Enough space & visibility, good for rides towards Chekov or M3 (Obninsk)
Take train from Belorusskaya to Trekhgorka. Not all stop there. The spot is 2 min wa
It is a bit hard to take a car cuz of a small 'parkin pocket' , however, it's possible and drivers going to Vyborg are ready to take on the board
Good spot at the crossin for hitching towards Kazan, best is to walk up the hill to here from Kugesi. Traffic is pretty fast.
Starting position from Moscow to Saint-Petersburg. In 200 meters uphill - cafe, parking spot for trucks.
HH spot. No lights, but enough space for truck for comfort stop. If you are going to Moscow, but your driver goes to V. Novgorod - it's your choice.

position is located right after road police checkpoint. 

siberian_explorer

Kiel mi eksciis ke en la elirado de la urba pretervojo ne ekzistas lumon kaj homoj eble pasis rapide, mi elektis eniri Volgograd kaj provi trasnporto gxis la urba elirado. Kaj tio funkciis. 2 kuddistanaj frateloj veturis min gxis grandega benzinostacio dum nokto. Tre frenezaj frateloj.

Mi dormis en la sofo de la enirado de la necesejo cxar la virino ku estis tie oferis min. Mi alvenis tie la 3a matene, kaj dormis gxis la 7a. Kirdankon., Multaj da kamionoj haltas tie. Sed automobilo kiu pasis en la cxefa vojo. La amiko Max. Dankon.
Mi trovis amikojn kiu helpis min dormi kaj ripozi en UlanUde dum mi reekipigxi kun pli bonaj vestagxoj por travivi en la malvarmega tempo. Do mi petveturis al la centro de Ulan Ude ekde cxi tie.
Familio haltis al mi, iomete poste la stacio. Bona loko.
Хороший закоулочек, подробно про него писали на хитчивики
примерно перед остановкой, которая на этой карте не отмечена
неплохая обочина на подъеме, вроде бы машины на развязке притормаживают, но у меня есть сомнения насколько стабильно тут будут останавливаться
Ĉi tiu loko estas pli bona ol mi pensis. Eĉ pli bona ĉe la komenco de la granda flanka vojo.

Potenciale tre tre bona pro la sumo de transportoj venantaj kaj el Sankt-Peterburgo kaj Moskvo, aŭ aliaj lokoj, ankaŭ havas trafiklumojn kiuj devigas duonon de la movado pasi pli malrapide kaj multajn kamionojn elirantajn el la benzinstacio. Tamen en pluva malvarma nokto kun la polico fanfaronanta ĉirkaŭe, ĝi povas esti infera. Dankon, André.

Ĉar mi ne komprenis kion fari, mi pensis pri veturigo ien por observi la vojon kaj vidi ĉu homoj bezonus fari rondiron por reveni kaj preni la pretervojon ĉirkaŭ la urbo aŭ resti en la granda benzinstacio antaŭe. Plej multaj homoj irantaj al la urbo, la kamiono kiu veturigis min iros al Irkutsk post 3 tagoj, sed mi jam volis iri.

Elirinte el la benzinstacio kaj provante identigi kiel tiu vojo funkcius, mi petis ilin lasi ĉi tien post preskaŭ 2 km. Tuj kiam mi rimarkis, ke estas lumo kaj loko por halti. Tie familio haltis al mi, mi levis la dikfingron sed ankaŭ mansvingis por esti pli videbla. Ankaŭ uzante la reflektajn veŝtojn. Ekde la Trumprennen mi ĉiam uzas ĉi tiun veŝton, ĉefe nokte.

General advice for all of Chuysky trakt: Best is to thumb at bus stops, every village has one. Even inside of town, cars have very high speeds, but visibility is often very good. Takes some time to find cars (average 30min), but you will always find rides. Many locals and other travelers also do hitchhiking, you may not be the only one at a spot.

General advice for all of Chuysky trakt: Best is to thumb at bus stops, every village has one. Even inside of town, cars have very high speeds, but visibility is often very good. Takes some time to find cars (average 30min), but you will always find rides. Many locals and other travelers also do hitchhiking, you may not be the only one at a spot.
еще один добрый калмык предложил заночевать в его степном доме если к ночи нас не заберут
стоял у въезда на заправку!
Хорошая точка, два раза стартовал с неё в Новгород и Москву, ждал не более 30 - 40 минут
От ТЦ "Мега" можно дойти по обочине за 20-30 минут, смотря какой маршрут выбрать
Good spot to go to Chelyabinsk, also at night.
Plenty of traffic going towards Grozny

so long maybe 'cause people not good
несколько дольше обычного, возможно потому что местные неособо отзывчивые. подобрал парень с узбекистана
My favourite spot to hitch-hike from Moscow to Minsk/Brest/Warsaw. 15 min from Shalikovo train station
нас 2 человека и 2 рюкзака по 70л. Мы шли вдоль трассы, и нас подобрал человек, несмотря на то, что мы не голосовали.
Нас 2 человека и 2 рюкзака по 70л, и мы поймали рейсовую маршрутку, которая нас подвезла бесплатно.
We were a couple hitchhiking to Ulan Ude.
Cars are going quite fast, mostly to Krasnoe Selo.
i got a truck from here who was waiting across road. good for direction Finnland. you can reach this place this marshrutka from subway station Ozerki
its good to direction Priozersk
should be easy to go outside the city, but not to a long distance
should be easy to go outside the city, but not to a long distance
Fakte mi bezonis atendi gxis uno inter la policistoj trovis min veturado. malfelicxe mia rusa ne estis tre bona por ekklarigi kiun mi volis.

There is a passport check-point 3 km. before Kyakhta and the driver will probably drop you off here. You may have to wait while they check your passport and try to figure out what you are doing. They don't want you to linger around this buffer zone, so an officer took me in his car and dropped me off right at the border.

Me and my friend (two guys) were traveling from Moscow to Riga, asked drivers here for the ride to Riga - nobody accepted (BUT maybe you'll be lucky so ask as much as possible). Right after the border on Latvian side there is a good spot to hithc-hike but drivers don't like to stop here. My advice is to walk by the road A12 further. Good luck everybody!

waited ~30min and got two small lifts and one big straight to moscow.
not much traffic here

Well as everyone i waited 3h at the petrol station, ( 30 min by the border then 2h30 at the petrol station ) with no succes , so i start walking for 1h30 with hitchiking each time a car/truck oass by then after 1h30 of walk a trucker stop and take me all the way to moscow , u probably ca. Check further down the new point at the junction where it wass with the same name of course !

Expect a long wait here. The road to Moscow is finished (at least it was when I hitched it July 2014), but there is VERY little traffic. Expect to change rides many times. Try to go from town to town until you get the big one to Moscow.
i think Latvia restricted fuel trafficking to once-a-week, thus lines seem to be much smaller Jan2012. I'm told you can cross by foot in Zilupe too.
I taked from here the first car in the night
I waited there 2 hrs and went by walk
loooosers!
Worst hitchhiking spot in Russia? 2 hitchhikers waited here 7 hours on a Tuesday morning in July 2009.
Me and my friend were waiting here for 10-15min for a ride straight to the border. No so much traffic in the afternoon on monday, but we were lucky :)

Well as mention on the previous point at the border , ive been walking from the border to her than i stand their for about 15/20 min and a trucker stoped and took me all the way to moscow ! So i guess not bad after all !
Хорошее место для автостопа в сторону Москвы. Стоянка, заправка (есть wi-fi) и закусочная Также можно стоять за поворотом на Белые Берега.
Очень плохое  место
Very few drivers are stopped.
Bad traffic.
Look for the traffic lights in Pustoshka. And there is only stop the vehicle.
You can catch a direct car toward Sebezh.
You can catch the big truck on a long distance.
Good for Latvian border, but low traffic
Good place if you go to south,early morning will be better time

Try to avoid hitchhiking from Moscow to Nizhny Novgorod on a friday....traffic is insane.
While seeing the huge traffic jam going up the hill I tried to get a lift to Nizhny Novgorod from there. After about 20 minutes I just decided to walk along the traffic jam searching eye contact with some driver and stuck out my thumb. That worked pretty well, however walking was the same speed :D TAKE CARE! The hard shoulder can become very dangerous in Russia!

If you want to go towards Nizhny Novgorod it will be better if you walk on to the other spot. TAKE CARE! In case that there's a traffic jam there will be cars using the hard shoulder and they go pretty fast.

got dropped of right here because the driver continued to Veliky Novgorod. I just stayed there and it wasn't too bad. I got into a car which was going to moscow. (I was having a stopover in Bologoye at Alexey's place (CS) which is half way to Moscow. )
I stayed somewhere here in front of a cementary to hitchhike on to St. Petersburg. Like most controlled border areas it wasn't too good. I guess it took me about 45 minutes.
Very good place for stop to Piter from Moscow

Best hitchhiking spot in Moscow direction. Cars are moving slowly after the traffic lights.
From railway station take a trolleybus #10 till the last stop. Or take bus#22 till stop named "Avtorynok moskovkiy". Walk a bit to pass a gas station and you're on the spot!
If you want to go east, you should better take a bus to Kamens-Shahtynski, it will be much easier
Only some cars stops to pick up you if you are moving east
Not a big traffic, waiting time is near 30 min
there are lots teaffic but not really many car stop, i waited about an hour to give me a lift, it were 4 lifts to bring me to the destinatin where 80km from yekatalinburg.
point for hiking to east from Perm. You may take bus number 19 from city center for the end of route and after cross under railroad bridge for this point
If driver leaves you next to previous crossroads the best solution is to walk a bit to cross bridge over local railroad and hitch after road became wide again.

Very often you will stuck here on the way from Novosibirsk to Barnaul bacause you dont plan trip or driver didn't explain his destination. Generally bad place to stuck and waste an hour. Road here is perfect so drivers drive 100+ km/h. Finally you will be picked up by someone but best solution is to avoid lifts to ZATO Sibirsky
Take a bus or walk to "Berezovka". Most vehicles here are going to Kansk.
на Вытегру
It is the place on the bypass road where cars have not so hi speed. Krasnoyarsk direction.
It´s in the entrance of this town, To get here from Ulan Ude you can take the buses 155, 177 and 129.
Very good place to hitchhike, in the entrance to this town. The fluenty f the traffic in this area is what makes you been waiting more than expected.
Pig farm, bad smell
Direction: Buddenovsk
Direction: Volgograd, Moscow
Border, a lot of taxis
directions: West - Perm, Moscow, civilization; South - Chelyabinsk, Middle Asia, East - Yekaterinburg, Siberia
Рязанская южная окружная дорога, М5. В сторону Пензы, Самары, Челябинска
dir: Vologda. bus number 93 takes you til the town zoo, from there walk through the huge intersection.

It's once point for hiking from Perm to west of Russia (Izhevsk, Moscow) that i'd try. You can take busses number 8, 20 from center of city and gotta bus stop "stadion Avangard" - "стадион авангард" on russian.
Here is so bad for hitchhiking. This road is uninhabited for going to Matveev road. I wait for 30 minutes to catch a car. But for going to Taganrog. Here is very useful. :)

I wait more than 30 Minutes. One of truck driver take me up to Taganrog! But here is not very good for hitchhiking. The cars are so fast to stop. But if you have chance, you can meet the traffic jam like me. It's better to stop a car.

В этом месте, по сути, трасса М-53 вливается в трассу К-95. Машинам, следующим по М-53, необходимо проехаться по извилистому лепестку и пересечь едущую на север полосу К-95, пропустив при этом ещё и машины с ведущей на юг полосы. В общем, на лепестке машины стоят, порой их там очень много (штук 15). Наша позиция просматривается с лепестка прекрасно. Скорость машин сразу после поворота, ясное дело, крайне мала. Остановится на обочину можно.

(И всё бы ничего, да вот стояли мы на этом месте часа 3

Сразу после поста ДПС трасса имеет три полосы, крайняя правая из которых логичным образом через метров 50 переходит в Московскую улицу деревни Емельяново. Поэтому машины, едущие не в деревню, по крайней правой полосе ехать не будут и, как следствие, стопиться будут неохотно.
this place with police checkpoint looks more efficient than others because of speed limit
Из Москвы на электричке с Ленинградского вокзала до Клина. Пройти до Питерской трассы 5 минут. Дальше автостопом до Питера. Удачи!
Условно-скоростная. Стопщика видно издалека.
Довольно скоростная. Автобусная остановка. Не очень.
Позиция - за развязкой. Лучше чуть-чуть подняться на пригорок.
Условно-скоростная. Но стопится нормально.
Позиция за железнодорожным переездом. С каждым годом - всё больше локала. Впрочем, на локале можно доехать до поста ДПС.
Рассчитывать тут можно лишь на машины, выезжающие из Златоуста. Но их вполне достаточно.
Вполне приемлемо. Места для остановки достаточно, если оно не занято фурами. В пасмурную погоду тут густой туман и крайне хреновая видимость.
Место остановки-стоянки. Стопится плохо, зато можно впрашиваться в машины, которые часто останавливаются, чтобы заехать в кафе-магазин. Для чистого автостопа надо уходить за развязку.
С 2011 года - зона действия знака "Остановка запрещена". Чтобы выйти из зоны действия, надо пройти несколько сотен метров до пригорка.
Место вроде бы нормальное, скорость машин низкая.
Место для остановки удобное, но машин в сторону границы мало, останавливаются неохотно. Возможно, проще пешком один час до границы прогуляться, чем торчать здесь.
В сторону Челябы средняя скорость машин, стопится нормально.
Ничем особенным позиция не запомнилась.
Средне. Остановка общественного транспорта действует деморализующе. Но в общем-то уехать можно.
Пригорок. Не самая высокая скорость машин. Уехать можно.
В сторону Челябинска позиция средненькая. Автобусная остановка. Ночью слегка освещено.
Условно-скоростная позиция, но стопится нормально, уехать можно.
Богатство выбора позиции. Стоянка фур, кафе. Чтобы не мешал локал и всякие темные личности, лучше уйти за стоянку, к табличке с указанием расстояния до Челябинска.
Ничего особенного. Уехать можно. Скорость машин, как правило, не очень большая. Места на обочине хватает.
Условно скоростная позиция. В сторону Челябинска стопится нормально.
сюда неплохо попасть, чтоб оторваться от Челябинска. Прибавляется серьезный поток с объездной, на него и нужно ориентироваться.
От развязки нужно уходить на пригорок. Стоп не очень хороший.
I walked couple km until got good spot on the top of the hill
this place is horrorible - lots of homeless people around trying to get a lift, then smell from huge local DUMP. walking further is a better solution
Get here by local cars from the point at the roundabout near the airport. Drivers will show they turn to the left — show in response that you agree, many of them go to Chernorosk.
In evenings, there is heavy local traffic to Chernogorsk. The road has a safety barrier by the right side, so it's hard for drivers to stop.
Easyest way to leave city in northern direction. Use trolley 4 to get to roundabount.
Place to take a lift to Sayano-Shushenskaya hydroelectric power station. Get here by bus #107 from Abakan's bus statiton (36 rubles, 2012). Go out of bus before the fork to Belyy Yar (Белый Яр).
take bus to ДСК-2
driver said that this spot is much better that previous near police checkpoint
I stood there for 1 hour then moved 100meters to the next position and got a lift in 5 minutes :)
place right after police checkpoint accessible by 701 bus from bus station. get ticket to Emelyanovo

Good position to get to Rubtsovsk located next to the police post and railroad crossing, so cars move relatively slowly. Almost all traffic is local, not farther than 30 km, but cars to Rubtsovsk are there too.

Хорошая позиция, чтобы добраться до Рубцовска, расположенная сразу после поста ДПС и ЖД переезда, так что машины там двигаются небыстро. Почти весь трафик локальный, не дальше 30 км, но машины до Рубцовска тоже попадаются.
Here is a spot where locals trying to get lift. Ask drivers to pick you up to the roundabout where you can get truck.
great spot to get car directly to Barnaul after some time of cancelling local cars
This is the best hitchhiking spot for heading west from the Chernyshevskoye-Kybartai border crossing‎.
Most people will be heading to Jakovlevo and there are more local hitchhikers than cars.
metro Polezhaevskaya, walk/hitch a ride west until it turns into novo-ryzhskaya, later there's a bridge and tunnel before which you want to get a car at least to MKAD
Vorov: avoid on your route SPb-Moscow. Speed too high, better get a ride further past this town.
the transit road actually joins the road from NN somewhere in Kstowo
I stood here for a pretty long time, when I finally stoped a car. It\\'s about 1km from a Mego shopping centre. I think it will be better to stop from Kstovo.

Only one girl named Sashka is willing to stop. But she dose not like to drive a car. Thats the main problem. She is a good company, bay her a drink, you want regret it. One tip more. Dont ask her to go to a museum, Sasha prefers ice cream!! Do not talk about unexisting animals when she is trying to sleep!!
From Moscow to Voronezh, Rostov, Black Sea. Better to stand on the left side of the ramp, as it has larger shoulder.
you get traffic from MKAD going to krasnogorsk mostly. not very easy to get here too.
Метро Звездная, 5 минут до Московского шоссе. Голосую около завода Самсон, там два быка и еду в сторону Москвы. С пересадками..

take trolleybus #1 or route bus(marshrutka) also #1 to Cheremushki then walk couple hundred meters from crossroads to empty field direction. easyest to get but not the best way to leave the town

siberian_explorer
kun la vento kaj la malvarmeco de la epoko mi preskaux mortis. Eble bona, sed malfacila per mi.
verŝajne la plej bona loko el Samara dumnokte. Homoj pasas vere rapide, sed estas lumo, loko por halti kaj multaj kamionoj haltantaj. Tiam mi renkontis Hassen, kiu multe helpis min.

Tio estis freneza. La lasta kamionisto, Hassen, donis al mi monon kaj vokis taksion al ĉi tiu benzinstacio el la urbocentro, tiam la taksio eĉ ne akceptis mian pagon, li ankaŭ donis al mi monon. Poste, iom suferante pro la malvarmo, mi eniris la benzinstacion, reorganizis min pli bone, ricevis donacon por alia kafo, revenis kaj ricevis veturon de Uber. Ĉi tio estis epopeo.

Eble mi estis la unua petveturanto sur la pretervojo, ĉar la viro, kiu min lasis en ĉi tiu benzinstacio, laboras por ĉi tiu vojo kaj kunprenis min laŭlonge de ĝi unu monaton antaŭ ĝia inaŭguro. Ĉi tiu benzinstacio estas mojosa. Sed iom malfacila nokte. Roman kunprenis min al Tjumen kaj helpis min kun nova ŝuo.

Ĝi ŝajnas esti bona, sed pro iu nekonata kialo ĝi ne estas. Mi opinias, ke la trafikcirklo antaŭe povus esti pli bona. Se estas tre malvarme kaj malseke, estas eĉ pli malbone. En tiaj kondiĉoj almenaŭ vi povas halti de tempo al tempo por varmiĝi en la mikro-butiko de la benzinstacio.
5\5 машин что остановились, ехали в новороссийск, думаю в том направлении место +- 100 метров отличное, а вот в сторону Тамани отсюда выбраться очень сложно
место примерное...
вьезд на заправку, место спорное, но подобрали быстро

если не считать ;ого, что от точки высадки пришлось пройти несколько км, то точка более менее нормальная. проблема в том, что в краснодарском крае люди почти не подбирают автостоперов. уехал на дальнобое ехавшим чинить фуру в шахты
После моста пройти и будет более менее норм место

For me this was not a good hitchhiking spot because I think nobody there was going to Helsinki. For example I didnt see any car with one european registration plate. I guess people normally dont go to helsinki by that way. I had to take a bus.
Route to Moscow ;)
should be easy to go outside the city, but not to a long distance
When you are male and you're alone you are fucked. I had waited for 7 hours once and recenlty it took me 4 hours in a rain to get a car to Novosibirsk.
I h-hiked from here 3 times and cars always come back to pick you up.
This place accessible from city center afoot. I prefer to stand here. Every time same pattren. Car pass by and come back to pick you up.
Little traffic. They come only to the locals.
You'll be wait about 30-40 min

got dropped of at the wrong side of vladimir while hitchhiking to Nizhny Novgorod. Tried to make my way through the city. At this point I gave it a try for approximately an hour but didn't manage to get a ride. Continued walking and somewhere further up a girl drove me to the exit of vladimir just to be nice :)

I tried to hitch a ride from somwhere here to moscow. It was quite difficult and I couldn't really find a good place to stand. It's probably best to stand at some of the cross walks. It was also not really worth it to walk on towards the hill to make use of the natural slow down. There's less space and cars are as fast. If you end up here just be patient and within an hour you'll get your lift ;)
Bad place for HH to south. You should better try to get to Bataisk by train or bus, and try HH from there
Very slow, and too many locals. Worth trying to catch someone to at least Pskov on the nearest gasoline station

dir: Yaroslavl, Vologda. not the best place, but i went just by the map, however it worked. get here with elektrichka from yaroslavsky vokzal. from the station zelenogradskaya it's a 20 mins walk + need to cross the highway!
We were a couple, standing a signal to Ussurisk.
In the enrance to the Main Bus station of Artem.
Good, fast hitch-hiking but road is under construction for a significant stretch of the road (end of May 2013) slowing down truck drivers
М10, Ленинградское шоссе, обход Твери. После пересечения со Старицким шоссе в сторону Москвы.

Блокпост за съездом с трассы М5 на Коломну. 
Мешает знак "Остановка запрещена" сразу после позиции ментов

Рязанская южная окружная дорога, М5. В сторону Пензы, Самары, Челябинска.
После пересечения с михайловкой.
Рязанская южная окружная дорога, М5. В сторону Пензы, Самары, Челябинска.
One Backpacker. stood almost an hour with many cars slowing down but not stopping. maybe it's better to stand after the birdge.
To Irkutsk. Just before the train crossing and the bridge entering Kultuk
Кисловато. Не очень удобный спуск, если память мне не изменяет.
Рассчитывать можно на машины, выезжающие из Сатки. Ночью темно.
Перед крутым подъемом после крутого спуска. Не очень.
Крутой спуск в сторону Челябы. И раньше-то было хреново, а теперь это еще и зона действия знака "Остановка запрещена".
За поворотом на Сухтелинский - неслабый подъем. Говорят, уехать можно, но нам смешанной двойкой это не удалось. Пришлось пройти пешком пару километров.
position of THE HELL are here! the farm and local severe system factory produce so strong smell so bevare real throw outs. RUN! Run from this place!
cars are toooo fast here
I had spent 1 hour to realize that this direction is wrong
this direction isn't correct to find transit transport. please try another position on Baymakskaya st
car going to Nazarovo from Krasnoyarsk will leave you here. lots of local cars.
seems like good position to Kemerovo but drivers are afraid to stop near police check point
If you were lucky enough to get transit car but you need to go to Krasnoyarsk this place is not the best way to get to the city. better to try police checkpoint couple km before this spot

had a nice 30km winter hike trying to stay warm. with 2 cars only - 7km ride total. That's with reflectors, light and yellow jacket/pants. maybe there's a jail nearby or just general border zone fears ;]
i think this is the last reasonable hh spot comming from russia. later on - only small intersections and woods woods woods.
High traffic and, in spite of it, almost no chance to get a ride. The only hope is truckers' parking.
рекомендую искать попутку в крым на более ранних участках, на этом месте пока что мало-малские шансы есть, но думаю со временем их станет и того меньше
Народу много заправляется, можно подходить спрашивать, но нам тут поймать ничего не удалось. Больше повезло когда прошли дальше по трассе и стали голосовать. Кто один, я думаю, быстро уедет
опять пришлось пройтись от точки высадки, стоял бы и дальше, люди едут с покерфэйсом, подобрал меня сильноверующий человек
Отсюда мы поймали рейсовую маршрутку до Балаково за 700 руб. Нас 2 человека и 2 рюкзака по 70 л.
Многие едут недалеко, поэтому мало останавливаются. Нас 2 человека и 2 рюкзака по 70 лит.
никто не останавливался, многие ехали до ближайших маленьких населённых пунктов. Нас 2 человека и 2 рюкзака по 70л.
1 hour of waiting and then gave up and walk forward

I waited 5 hours to get a ride on this bypass road.
extremely small amount of cars here. may be 1 car per 5 min. 
eastern part of bypass road is terrible, cars never stop, because almost all of them go to villages nearby

nobody stop here, a very little amount of cars here.
eastern part of bypass road is terrible, cars never stop, because almost all of them go to villages nearby
I walked here, nobody stopped. eastern part of bypass road is terrible, cars never stop, because almost all of them go to villages nearby
eastern part of bypass road is terrible, cars never stop, because almost all of them go to villages nearby

it didn'T seem like a bad spot but this day it just didn't work out. Over three hours of waiting. walking on didn't make sense as well. Two other hitchhikers a few hundred metres ahead were standing there for three hours as well. All travelling east.
no one stop
from 30min no one stop us to the Moscow
A horrible place! Dont even try! We was waiting near 2 hours in the snow winter, and no one from hundreds cars stoped!
We were a couple hitch hiking to Bikin, this spot is too in the middle of the city and noone go straight there.
Close to a petrol station in the center of the city.

after already wating about 5-6 hours until we got here (from Novosibirsk by 3 hitches) we thought it seems like a good place. we stood in three different places (in two different days) but just no car picked us up.
Right after the split with Chulim going to Omsk
some body please delete this stuff. touchpad bug
If you were lucky enough to get transit car but you need to go to Krasnoyarsk this place is not the best way to get to the city. better to try police checkpoint couple km before this place
Vorov: one of the towns which should be avoided on SPb-Moscow route. Better get a ride further down the road.

не садитесь к тем, кто едет до Каменска!! в городе и после него невозможно поймать попутку. я 3 часа шел сквозь город и дальше по трассе, на трассе либо неудобные места в гору/на повороте/либо знаки остановка запрещена. шел 3 часа и около часа стоял на точке, потому как больше не было сил идти дальше. но мои потуги дали плоды и я сел на фуру, на которой за сутки доехал до пригорода москвы, откуда уже на электричку до мск пересел
место говно, я вообще от дождя под кипарисом прятался, когда стоящая на аварийке машина предложила подвезти
There's a stop sign over here
нас 2 человека и 2 рюкзака по 70л
